1.name: To Catch a Thief
1.description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

2.name: Lady and the Tramp
2.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

3.name: Rebel Without a Cause
3.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

4.name: Marty
4.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

5.name: The Night of the Hunter
5.description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

6.name: East of Eden
6.description: A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.

7.name: Guys and Dolls
7.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

8.name: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
8.description: A widowed doctor of both Chinese and European descent falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist revolution.

9.name: The Seven Year Itch
9.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

10.name: Run for Cover
10.description: Mistaken for train robbers, Matt Dow and Davey Bishop are shot at by the sheriff and his posse but they are cleared and hired as lawmen.

11.name: Kiss Me Deadly
11.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

12.name: The Court Jester
12.description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.

13.name: Oklahoma!
13.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

14.name: Killer's Kiss
14.description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

15.name: All That Heaven Allows
15.description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

16.name: The Ladykillers
16.description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

17.name: Picnic
17.description: Emotions are ignited amongst the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labour Day picnic.

18.name: This Island Earth
18.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

19.name: The Trouble with Harry
19.description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

20.name: The Indian Fighter
20.description: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.

21.name: Man Without a Star
21.description: A drifter working as foreman for an iron-fist female rancher must chose sides between his attractive employer and the other neighboring settlers who are mistreated by her.

22.name: The Road to Denver
22.description: Two fugitive Texan brothers at odds with one another flee to Colorado where they take jobs with rival bosses.

23.name: Pather Panchali
23.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

24.name: Foxfire
24.description: In Arizona, during the 1950s, privileged white girl Amanda Lawrence marries half-Apache mining engineer Jonathan Dartland who dreams of finding gold in an old abandoned Apache mine.

25.name: Les diaboliques
25.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

26.name: Daddy Long Legs
26.description: On a trip to France, millionaire Jervis Pendleton sees an 18 year old girl in an orphanage. Enchanted with her, but mindful of the difference in their ages, he sponsors her to college in ...                See full summary »

27.name: Du rififi chez les hommes
27.description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

28.name: Revenge of the Creature
28.description: Men capture the Creature from the Black Lagoon (1954) and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

29.name: Mister Roberts
29.description: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

30.name: Sissi
30.description: In the first of a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the young vibrant princess catches the eye of her sister's fiancé, Emperor Franz Josef.

31.name: Wichita
31.description: In 1874, after noticing the total lawlessness in Wichita, Wyatt Earp reluctantly accepts the Marshal's job and runs into the worst local troublemakers.

32.name: Summertime
32.description: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

33.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
33.description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

34.name: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
34.description: American frontiersman Davy Crockett fights in the Creek Indian War, is elected to the U.S. Congress and fights for Texas at the Alamo.

35.name: Underwater!
35.description: Two scuba divers find a shipwreck which may contain undiscovered treasure, however, their attempt to salvage it is threatened by scavengers.

36.name: Artists and Models
36.description: Rick Todd uses the dreams of his roommate Eugene as the basis for a successful comic book.

37.name: Sommarnattens leende
37.description: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

38.name: To Hell and Back
38.description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

39.name: The Man with the Golden Arm
39.description: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.

40.name: Ordet
40.description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

41.name: Blackboard Jungle
41.description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

42.name: Tarantula
42.description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

43.name: Richard III
43.description: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

44.name: The Kentuckian
44.description: A Kentucky widower bound for 1820's Texas with his young son is thwarted in his efforts by a corrupt constable, a long-standing family feud, and a beautiful indentured servant.

45.name: The Dam Busters
45.description: The story of how the British attacked German dams in World War II by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

46.name: The Man from Laramie
46.description: A stranger, Will Lockhart, defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

47.name: The Desperate Hours
47.description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

48.name: The Rose Tattoo
48.description: An Italian-American neighborhood in Louisiana is disturbed when truck driver Rosario Delle Rose is killed by police while smuggling. His buxom widow Serafina miscarries, then over a period ...                See full summary »

49.name: The End of the Affair
49.description: In war-torn London, Maurice Bendrix (Van Johnson) falls in love with neighbor Sarah Miles (Deborah Kerr). They begin an illicit romance behind Sarah's husband's back. While war does not ...                See full summary »

50.name: Make me an Offer!
50.description: Charlie as a boy on a trip to the local museum, falls in love with a green portland vase (wedgewood), and decides that this is his quest in life to find it. So as a grown up he is still ...                See full summary »
